text: Kinya kan ri jaꞌmaril chiꞌwe, kinya ri nujaꞌmaril chiꞌwe. Man je ta kinbꞌan in chuyaꞌik jetaq ri kakibꞌan ri winaq ajuwachulew. 14:27 Ri winaq aꞌj Israel are kakiya rutzil kiwach kakibꞌij: “Kꞌo ta bꞌanom wi kꞌo jaꞌmaril chiꞌxoꞌl” are waꞌ ri tajin kuchomaj ri Jesús are xubꞌij: “Man are ta kinya ri jaꞌmaril ri kutzuj ri uwachulew chiꞌwe.”Man kakꞌaxir taj iwanimaꞌ xuqujeꞌ man kixiꞌj ta iwibꞌ.
